content: nb the decreases for the main body are slightly different from the panel decreases so that the panel pattern isn t interrupted too much chart 2 decrease for crown the dashes -- in the middle of the row indicate the centre line of the panel please note that row 12 is different to the other even-numbered row r 1 k2 decrease k2 yo k1 yo k3 k2 decrease tbl -- k2 decrease k3 yo k1 yo k2 k2 decrease tbl 20 sts r 2 knit r 3 k2 decrease k1 k2 decrease yo k1 yo k2 k2 decrease tbl -- k2 decrease k2 yo k1 yo k2 decrease tbl k1 k2 decrease tbl r 4 knit r 5 k2 decrease k3 yo k1 yo k1 k2 decrease tbl k2 decrease k1 yo k1 yo k3 k2 decrease tbl r 6 knit r 7 k2 decrease k2tog k2 yo k1 yo k2 decrease tbl k2 decrease yo k1 yo k2 k2tog tbl k2 decrease tbl r 8 knit r 9 k2 decrease yo k1 yo k3 k2 decrease tbl k2 decrease k3 yo k1 yo k2 decrease tbl r 10 knit r 11 k2 decrease k1 yo k1 yo k2 k2 decrease tbl k2 decrease k2 yo k1 yo k1 k2 decrease tbl r 12 k2 decrease k12 k2 decrease tbl r 13 k2 decrease k1 yo k1 yo k1 k2 decrease tbl k2 decrease k1 yo k1 yo k1 k2 decrease tbl r 14 knit r 15 k2 decrease k1 yo k2 decrease yo k2 decrease tbl k2 decrease yo k2 decrease tbl yo k1 k2 decrease tbl r 16 knit r 17 k2 decrease k2 yo k2 decrease tbl k2 decrease yo k2 k2 decrease tbl r 18 knit r 19 k2 decrease k1 k2 decrease tbl k2 decrease k1 k2 decrease tbl 6 sts remain in panel next row follow lace panel chart 2 r 1 then * k10 k2 decrease repeat from * to end of round 110 sts + panel sts next row knit as with chart 2 r 2 next row follow lace panel chart 2 r 3 knit to end of round next row follow lace panel chart 2 r 4 then * k9 k 2 decrease repeat from * to end of round 100 sts + panel next row knit as with chart 2 r5 continue decreasing every third row as set following the appropriate chart 2 row until there are 80 sts plus panel sts then decrease the main body every 2 row still following chart 2 panel pattern until there are 36 sts total including panel sts shape top next row knit next row k2 decrease k1 to end 24 sts next row knit next row k2 decrease to end 12 sts nexr row k2 decrease to end 6 sts break yarn thread yarn through remaining stitches and pull tight to close sew in ends block and leave to dry before wearing this settles and flattens the lace panel well worth
